channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Snowflake’s stock has been on fire, and earnings are fueling the rally further
item.description: The data-warehousing company hit a revenue milestone and issued an upbeat outlook.

item.title: Thanks to cheap gas, Americans may travel in record numbers for Memorial Day — and hit pause on other economic worries
item.description: U.S. consumer sentiment stands near a record low, but that isn’t expected to dampen plans for the Memorial Day weekend, which will see gasoline prices...

item.title: Bond ‘vigilantes’ are sending warnings globally. What does that mean for your portfolio?
item.description: Bond vigilantes appear to be circling the globe, sending yields on government debt higher partly on concern over worsening fiscal situations.

item.title: Dow logs worst day in a month. Here are the reasons driving the rout.
item.description: The stock market’s selloff picked up steam on Wednesday, sending the Dow Jones Industrial Average to its steepest daily decline in a month.

item.title: 30-year Treasury yield is above 5% again — that’s usually a bad sign for stocks
item.description: Continued worries about the U.S. fiscal outlook triggered another selloff in long-dated U.S. government debt as of Wednesday morning, pushing the yiel...

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
